item.description:
The hike will be through the western most areas of the park along several lesser known and used roads. We will hike through some beautiful pine woods, by several cranberry bogs,
and near a pond and campground. There will be a few small rolling hills, but much of the hike will be relatively flat.
Since parking is limited at the starting point, we will meet at Park Headquarters at 12:45 and car pool to the starting point which is on Bare Hill Road near the Fire Tower.
Hike distance is 4+ miles.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: October First Sunday Hike of the Month
